titles.title: Ending DHS Funding for Liberal Propaganda Act
Ending DHS Funding for Liberal Propaganda Act
A bill to prohibit the use of Department of Homeland Security grant funds for politically biased activities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Ending DHS Funding for Liberal Propaganda Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Homeland Security from issuing grant funding to any entity that will use the funds to develop any programming
that engages in partisan political advocacy or promotes discrimination on the basis of political affiliation, orrelating to countering narratives or views on political topics.
